title: Simplify Inside of Root
text: Simplify inside the radical. This can be done by removing a common factor from the numerator and the demoninator

title: Finding the Greatest Common Factor
text: What is the greatest common factor of $$45$$ and 80?

title: Factoring
text: After finding the GCF of both values, we can remove the common denominator of both terms.

title: Root of terms
text: Now that our fraction is comprised of roots in the numerator and denominator, we can take the roots of both respectively to get our answer.

title: Simplifying Expression
text: If we factor the terms, what will our answer be?
